node.statement: Step 1.3.3 (Phase transition at q=1): The transition from polynomial (q=1) to exponential (q≠1) non-melonic asymptotics constitutes a phase transition in the large-j thermodynamics. At q=1, the free energy is dominated by the melonic saddle. For q≠1, the exponential growth of non-melonic diagrams signals a new saddle point structure. The BPS sector (ker H_q) is smooth across this transition (SUSY preserved for all q>0), but the non-BPS spectrum changes qualitatively.
